org.microtitan.diffusive.launcher.config

Class RestfulDiffuserConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.launcher.config.RestfulDiffuserConfig

  • public class RestfulDiffuserConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    TODO figure out how best to allow the configuration of the diffuser strategy. Configuration class used to configure the Restful Diffuser framework. The method annotated with DiffusiveConfiguration is the method that will be called by the DiffusiveLauncher to configure the framework. Any static method can be used in this manner. For example, one could write a static method that reads from a configuration file and then performs the necessary configuration.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp Jul 18, 2012

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public static final void configure(java.lang.String configFileName)
        Method that is called to configure the Diffusive framework. In particular, creates a RestfulDiffuser with the specified diffusion end-points and the class path URI passed to the remote restful diffuser so that it can load classes for which it needs to run diffused methods. Sets the default diffuser into the KeyedDiffuserRepository. This is a required step because the byte code engineering needs to know which diffuser to use, and the repository is the location holding that diffuser.

      • loadConfig

        private static final RestfulDiffuserConfigXml loadConfig(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads the configuration object from the XML file and returns it. If the configuration file couldn't be read properly, then returns null.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the configuration file to read
        Returns:
        The configuration object or null if the configuration file can't be read properly

      • loadStrategy

        private static final DiffuserStrategy loadStrategy(java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.Class<? extends DiffuserStrategyConfigXml> clazz)
        Loads the DiffuserStrategy from the specified file name and its associated XML configuration Class. Note that the XML configuration Class must have a generic argument that extends the DiffuserStrategyConfigXml class.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file containing the configuration information for creating the DiffuserStrategy.
        clazz - The Class into which the configuration information is loaded. Note that the class must extend the DiffuserStrategyConfigXml class.
        Returns:
        The loaded DiffuserStrategy
